subtests.name: Test IDL implementation of Accelerometer Sensor
Sensor interface: existence and properties of interface object
Sensor interface object length
Sensor interface object name

Sensor interface: existence and properties of interface prototype object's "constructor" property
Sensor interface: existence and properties of interface prototype object's @@unscopables property
Sensor interface: attribute activated
Unscopable handled correctly for activated property on Sensor
Sensor interface: attribute hasReading
Unscopable handled correctly for hasReading property on Sensor
Sensor interface: attribute timestamp
Unscopable handled correctly for timestamp property on Sensor
Sensor interface: operation start()
Unscopable handled correctly for start() on Sensor
Sensor interface: operation stop()
Unscopable handled correctly for stop() on Sensor

Unscopable handled correctly for onreading property on Sensor
Sensor interface: attribute onactivate
Unscopable handled correctly for onactivate property on Sensor
Sensor interface: attribute onerror
Unscopable handled correctly for onerror property on Sensor

Accelerometer must be primary interface of new Accelerometer();
Stringification of new Accelerometer();
Accelerometer interface: new Accelerometer(); must inherit property "x" with the proper type

Accelerometer interface: new Accelerometer(); must inherit property "z" with the proper type
Sensor interface: new Accelerometer(); must inherit property "activated" with the proper type

Sensor interface: new Accelerometer(); must inherit property "start()" with the proper type

Sensor interface: new Accelerometer(); must inherit property "onreading" with the proper type
Sensor interface: new Accelerometer(); must inherit property "onactivate" with the proper type
Sensor interface: new Accelerometer(); must inherit property "onerror" with the proper type
